# gamefabric_role_binding (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role` (String) The name of the role this binding applies to.

### Optional

- `groups` (List of String) The groups this role binding applies to.
- `users` (List of String) The users this role binding applies to.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the role binding.
